description: Number of partitions of n into parts 7k+1 or 7k+6.
formula: a(n) ~ exp(2*Pi*sqrt(n/21)) / (4 * 21^(1/4) * sin(Pi/7) * n^(3/4)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 26 2015
mathematica: nmax = 100; Rest[CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/((1 - x^(7k+1))*(1 - x^(7k+6))), {k, 0, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 26 2015 *)
